description: Kitāb al-nafaqāt - bāb fī al-iqrār, ff. 97. 255 x 185; 200 x 130 mm. 23 lin. Dhū al-ḥijjah 689. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 485 (II, commentary 1); S I, 670 (II, b). Acephalous second vol. - incip. (as extant): ... انه ىحرم واعلم انه لا ىفىد الخلاف بوجود الوطى بل هو جار
author: Irbilī, Aḥmad ibn Mūsá, d. 1225
title: Sharḥ al-Tanbīh.
creator: Irbilī, Aḥmad ibn Mūsá, d. 1225
subject: Fīrūzābādī al-Shīrāzī, Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf, ca. 1003-1083—Tanbīh fī al-fiqh
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
